title: Israelis See Netanyahu's U.S. Speech As Last-Ditch Pitch For Votes
teaser: Benjamin Netanyahu will address Congress just before Israeli elections. NPR's Rachel Martin speaks to Chemi Shalev, the U.S. editor of Haartz, about how the controversial visit is playing back home.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
